CustomField.inlineHelpText: These pre-requisites are to be communicated to users: • Active triggers, process builders, workflows, etc. may lead to replicate failures • Max uncompressed metadata size per job is 400 MB. It is recommended to set an appropriate batch size for any metadata exceeding the limit • Inactive owners in SF leads to replicate failures • Include all dependencies in the Replicate job as missing some might lead to failures • For a PoC, we will request access to the customer environment
CustomField.label: Review Vault Pre-requisites
